sentences.en: 96 per cent of the eligible employees took up the offer.
sentences.cn: 符合条件的雇员有96%接受了这个条件。

sentences.en: A number of groups offer their services free of charge.
sentences.cn: 一些团体免费提供服务。

sentences.en: Both offer excellent value at around £90 for a double room.
sentences.cn: 两家的双人客房都报出了大约90英镑的超值价格。

sentences.en: Can I offer you something to drink?
sentences.cn: 我给你拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.en: Do sit down. And may we offer you something to drink?
sentences.cn: 请坐，给您拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.en: Eventually Sam persuaded her to accept an offer of marriage.
sentences.cn: 最终萨姆说服她接受了求婚。

sentences.en: I can’t turn down the offer of a free trip to Milan!
sentences.cn: 我怎能拒绝免费去米兰旅行的机会！

sentences.en: I don’t need any help, but it was nice of you to offer.
sentences.cn: 我不需要任何帮助，但是我谢谢你的好意。

sentences.en: I still think I have a bit more to offer.
sentences.cn: 我还是认为我能再稍微多付出一点儿。

sentences.en: I thanked him for the offer but turned it down.
sentences.cn: 我谢绝了他的提议。

sentences.en: I’ll raise the subject when a suitable occasion offers itself.
sentences.cn: 等有合适的机会，我会把这件事提出来的。

sentences.en: Leningrad was the third alien city to offer him a surrogate home.
sentences.cn: 列宁格勒是他在异地安家的第三个外国城市。

sentences.en: Mr Dinkins visited the bereaved family to offer comfort.
sentences.cn: 丁金斯先生前往死者家吊唁。

sentences.en: Some shoppers looked bewildered by the sheer variety of goods on offer.
sentences.cn: 光是摆在那里的各式商品就让一些购物者晕头转向了。

sentences.en: the infill panels are offered up and bolted in position.
sentences.cn: 用于镶拼的填块已摆好位置并用螺栓固定，以便检验外观效果以及是否合适。

sentences.en: The men voted by a four-to-one majority to accept the pay offer.
sentences.cn: 男雇员以4比1的多数票接受了工资条件。

sentences.en: the number of permanent jobs on offer is relatively small.
sentences.cn: 长期工作的机会相对较小。

sentences.en: The offer of talks with Moscow marks a significant change from the previous Western position.
sentences.cn: 与莫斯科会谈的提议标志着先前西方立场的一个重大转变。

sentences.en: The shops also offer a keenly priced curtain-making service.
sentences.cn: 这些商店也提供价格优惠的窗帘制作服务。

sentences.en: They offer tips on topics such as home safety.
sentences.cn: 他们就家居安全等问题提供建议。

sentences.en: They would have to offer cast-iron guarantees to invest in long-term projects.
sentences.cn: 他们需提供绝对可靠的担保，才能投资长期项目。

sentences.en: This new design will offer undreamed-of levels of comfort, safety and speed.
sentences.cn: 这种新设计将会给您带来意想不到的舒适、安全和快捷。

sentences.en: Will you accept their offer?
sentences.cn: 你会接受他们的开价吗？

sentences.en: You may feel unworthy of the attention and help people offer you.
sentences.cn: 你可能会觉得自己不值得别人关心和帮助。
